page.title: 10GOLDEN HOUR
page.content:
WAS STARTED 16 YEARS AGO BY MEMBERS OF THE WOMENS INSTITUTE AND AT PRESENT HAS 28 MEMBERS. THEY MEET EVERY OTHER THURSDAY AFTERNOON, MARCH TO DECEMBER, WHEN THEY PLAY BINGO FOLLOWED BY TEA OR SOMETIMES THEY ARE INVITED TO A MEMBERS HOME.
THERE WERE 4 OUTINGS DURING THE YEAR; A TRIP TO WROXHAM, A BOAT TRIP FROM POTTER HEIGHAM TO ST BENETS ABBEY, A COACH TRIP TO CROMER AND A MEAL AT THE WHITE HORSE INN AT BRANCASTER.
4 MEMBERS FROM EACH OF 6 NEIGHBOURING CLUBS WERE INVITED TO THE HARVEST FESTIVAL IN ALL SAINTS CHURCH FOLLOWED BY AFTERNOON TEA IN THE VILLAGE HALL.
TWO GOLDEN WEDDINGS WERE CELEBRATED DURING THE YEAR BY MEMBERS.
